definition: to grow/to cultivate/to train/to educate/to patronize
to grow/to plant/to insert/to force on sb/to fall head first
to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)

sentences.english: The first group included 38 cultivated species.
sentences.chinese: 第一类由38份栽培青麻组成。

sentences.english: The confection of the nutritious liquid is a important technical problem in the hydroponics .
sentences.chinese: 营养液配制是无土栽培一个关键的技术问题。

sentences.english: Experiment of culturing Tricholoma giganteum by using rapeseed coat as culture material was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 用菜籽皮作培养料进行了巨大口蘑的栽培对比试验。

sentences.english: The stronger anti-cold ability of 'Lihong' suggested that the cultivation district of this variety could appropriately be expanded to the north.
sentences.chinese: 该品种具有较强的抗寒性，栽培区域可适当北扩。

sentences.english: Summary:High quality cultivation mode of vitis amurensis rupr is divided into six systems.
sentences.chinese: 山葡萄优质丰产栽培模式分六个系统。

sentences.english: Its characteristics and cultivation technology were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了其特性和栽培技术。

sentences.english: In addition, the techniques of high-yielding culture and seed production of "Jinyou 752" were introduced i…
sentences.chinese: 探讨了“金优752”的高产栽培技术和制种技术。

sentences.english: He grows rose in the garden.
It even proscribed the deliberate cultivation oflascivious thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 它甚至犯禁居心栽培的设法。

sentences.english: Ex-situ conservation has also been conducted. Some living specimens are planted in the Shing Mun Arboretum .
sentences.chinese: 渔护署已进行迁地保护，城门标本林内有栽培。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the characteristics and its higy-yielding oultural techniques of "Chuanbei 1".
sentences.chinese: 该文主要介绍了川贝1号的特征特性及栽培技术要点。

sentences.english: Perennial ryegrass carpet lawn soil-less cultivation is of attractive and broad prospect.
sentences.chinese: 多年生黑麦草无土栽培技术具有十分广阔的发展前景。

sentences.english: The methods of domestication and cultivation Lactarius deliciosus were groped preliminarily.
sentences.chinese: 初步摸索出驯化栽培松乳菇的方法。

sentences.english: The Eucalyptus was the main pulp forest species in southern Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 桉树已成为湖南湘南地区栽培的主要纸浆林树种。

sentences.english: The invention belongs to the field of floriculture methods.
sentences.chinese: 本发明属于花卉栽培方法领域。

sentences.english: Monocultures are a case of such mutation.
sentences.chinese: 单栽培就是这样的一种转变。

definition: test planting/crop grown on a trial basis
to put one's heart (and soul) into sth/with great care
to cultivate/to breed/to foster/to nurture/to educate/to groom (for a position)/education/fostering/culture (biology)
(agriculture) to introduce a new plant variety
sowing in autumn (for a crop in spring)
